insert into p2p_finance_match_res ( invest_customer_id, invest_customer_name, finance_customer_id, finance_customer_name, invest_match_id, finance_match_id, invest_biz_id, finance_biz_id, invest_order_sn, finance_order_sn, trade_amt, finance_amt, match_share, borrow_product_id, borrow_year_rate, borrow_product_name, remark, create_time, update_time, creator, reviser, logic_state, biz_state ) values
( #{item.investCustomerId}, #{item.investCustomerName}, #{item.financeCustomerId}, #{item.financeCustomerName}, #{item.investMatchId}, #{item.financeMatchId}, #{item.investBizId}, #{item.financeBizId}, #{item.investOrderSn}, #{item.financeOrderSn}, #{item.tradeAmt}, #{item.financeAmt}, #{item.matchShare}, #{item.borrowProductId}, #{item.borrowYearRate}, #{item.borrowProductName}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.creator}, #{item.reviser}, #{item.logicState}, #{item.bizState} )
